name: message-tag
author: mkrause
description: ES6 template literal tag to format message strings

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf ./lib-cjs && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir lib-cjs --out-file-extension=.cjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf ./lib-esm && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir lib-esm --out-file-extension=.mjs --source-maps inline
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=cjs mocha --require @babel/register --recursive tests && tsd && echo '[tsd] success'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
